name: Nishith Yogi
text: I was blown away by the attention to detail.

name: Biju Bhatti
text: I couldn't have asked for a better moviegoing experience.

name: Zaina Srivastava
text: The emotional depth of the characters was astounding. I was utterly mesmerized by the visuals. The movie was a revelation in storytelling.

name: Vaibhav Dara
text: The movie was a true cinematic triumph.

name: Kashvi Venkataraman
text: I was laughing one minute and crying the next. I was completely enchanted by every moment of it. I was completely immersed in the world of the film.

name: Baiju Zacharia
text: The movie was a true work of art.

name: Rohan Gola
text: I couldn't wipe the grin off my face. The performances were Oscar-worthy.

name: Aarav Sahni
text: I was completely absorbed by every frame of it. The movie was an absolute delight from start to finish. The soundtrack was hauntingly beautiful.
